article:
'Organice' is a software suite for Engineering Document Management and Document
Control and is entirely based on Microsoft SharePoint and .NET technology.
Organice is being developed by Cadac Organice, a subsidiary of the Cadac Group.

The Cadac Organice Product Suite comprises the following modules;

* Cadac Organice Explorer
* Cadac Organice Transmit
* Cadac Organice Workbox
* Cadac Organice Publish
* Cadac Organice Scan

'Cadac Organice Explorer' [http://www.organice.com/en/products/organice-
explorer/Pages/default.aspx "Cadac Organice Explorer, smart client for
SharePoint providing engineering document management functionality"]
provides all the fundamental document management functionality. The user
interface has an MS Outlook look and feel, making it easy to use for everyone.
It integrates with Microsoft Office, Microsoft Outlook and various CAD
applications, including AutoCAD, Bricscad, Revit and MicroStation. Through an
integrated viewer, users can open, view and redline all documents, even if they
do not have access to the native application.

'Cadac Organice Transmit' [http://www.organice.com/en/products/organice-
transmit/Pages/default.aspx "Cadac Organice Transmit distributes multiple
SharePoint documents to multiple recipients using transmittals"]
distributes multiple documents efficiently to multiple recipients at once and
offers management information to document controllers who need to keep track of
transmittals. A distribution matrix specifies exactly which recipient needs to
receive which documents, and how many, and a distribution tracking list in
SharePoint keeps track of who received what and when.

'Cadac Organice Workbox' [http://www.organice.com/en/products/organice-
workbox/Pages/default.aspx "Cadac Organice Workbox automates business processes
with productive SharePoint workflows"] can be used to build productive
serial and parallel state workflows to automate business processes. Workflows
can be executed automatically or manually and users get visual feedback on the
status and history of the workflow.

'Cadac Organice Publish' [http://www.organice.com/en/products/organice-
publish/Pages/default.aspx "Cadac Organice Publish publishes and converts
SharePoint documents to other libraries and internal or external sites"]
can publish documents that are stored in SharePoint. Documents can be published
in their native format or in PDF, so that they can easily be opened, viewed and
annotated by others without the native application.

With 'Cadac Organice Scan' [http://www.organice.com/en/products/organice-
scan/Pages/default.aspx "Cadac Organice Scan stores scanned documents into
SharePoint"] incoming correspondence and other hardcopy documents can be
scanned and stored into the SharePoint document environment. Cadac Organice Scan
can be used in combination with any scanning device, including small format and
wide format scanners, standalone scanners and multifunctional devices.

Cadac Organice is distributed worldwide through a network of qualified partners
in the Benelux, EMEA (Europe, Middle East and Africa), Asia and Australia, and
the United States. [http://www.dmscentraal.nl/cadac-organice-bv-rapporteert-sterke-
groei.html Cadac Organice BV rapporteert sterke groei] DMS Centraal (27 January
2009) [http://www.avepoint.com/news/2009/05/04/avepoint-and-cadac-organice-forge-
partnership/ AvePoint and Cadac Organice Forge Partnership] AvePoint (4 May
2009)

On the 22nd of August 2005 at the annual Microsoft Worldwide Partner Conference
in Minneapolis, Cadac Group won the Microsoft Regional Winning Customer Award
for Cadac Organice Explorer, a Smart Client for SharePoint providing engineering
document management functionality and integrating SharePoint with CAD
applications, .
[http://www.nieuwsbank.nl/_payment/order/686629544/inp/2005/09/20/R191.htm Cadac
Group wint tijdens Microsoft Worldwide Partner Conference de Regional Winning
Customer Award] Nieuwsbank (14 September 2005) In the meantime, Cadac
Organice has evolved from product to product suite.
[http://www.organice.com/EN/Products/Pages/Default.aspx ''Official Organice
website - products]

In the engineering industry the biggest competitors of Cadac Organice are
ProjectWise, developed by Bentley Systems and Meridian by BlueCielo. In general
Cadac Group has to compete with solutions like Documentum, Hummingbird and
FileNet in the Document management system industry.
